00341   : Population( n, chrom )
00342 {
00343   subPop    = false;
00344   IndividualMOO indiv( chrom );

00347     vector< Individual * >::push_back( dummy );
00348   }

00352 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00353 // TO-PM-016
00354 PopulationMOO::PopulationMOO( const PopulationMOO& popmoo )
00355   : Population( )
00356 {
00357   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < popmoo.size( ); i++ ){
00358     IndividualMOO *dummy = new IndividualMOO( popmoo[i] );
00359     //std::vector< Individual * >::push_back( dummy );
00360          vector< Individual * >::push_back( dummy );
00361   }
00362   // copy internal variables
00363   index         = popmoo.index;
00364   subPop        = popmoo.subPop;
00365   ascending     = popmoo.ascending;
00366   spinOnce      = popmoo.spinOnce;
00367 }
00368 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00369 
00370 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00371 // TO-PM-017
00372 PopulationMOO::PopulationMOO( const Population& pop )
00373   : Population( pop )
00374 {
00375   for ( unsigned i = pop.size( ); i--; ){
00376     delete *( begin( ) + i );
00377     *( begin( ) + i ) = new IndividualMOO( pop[i] );
00378   }
00379   // copy internal variables
00380   index     = pop.getIndex( );
00381   subPop    = pop.getSubPop( );
00382   ascending = pop.ascendingFitness( );
00383   spinOnce  = pop.getSpinOnce( );
00384 }

00418 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00419 // TO-PM-033
00420 void PopulationMOO::resize( unsigned n )
00421 {
00422   unsigned i;
00423   unsigned s = size( );
00424 
00425   subPop    = false;
00426 
00427   // delete individualMOOs
00428   if ( n < s ){
00429     for ( i = n; i < s; i++ ){
00430       delete *( begin( ) + i );
00431     }
00432     vector< Individual * >::erase( begin( ) + n, end( ) );
00433   }
00434   // add individualMOOs
00435   else if ( n > s ){
00436     if ( s > 0 ){
00437       for ( i = s; i < n; i++ ){
00438         IndividualMOO *dummy = new IndividualMOO( (*this)[0] );
00439         vector< Individual * >::push_back( dummy );
00440       }
00441     }
00442     else{
00443       for ( i = s; i < n; i++ ){
00444         IndividualMOO *dummy = new IndividualMOO;
00445         vector< Individual * >::push_back( dummy );
00446       }
00447     }
00448   }
00449 }

00495 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00496 // TO-PM-044
00497 PopulationMOO& PopulationMOO::operator = ( const PopulationMOO& popmoo )
00498 {
00499   if ( size( ) != popmoo.size( ) ) {
00500     cerr << "Error in TO-PM-044" << endl;
00501     throw("size mismatch");
00502   }
00503   for ( unsigned i = size( ); i--; ) {
00504     (*this)[i] = popmoo[i];
00505   }
00506   // copy internal variables
00507   index         = popmoo.index;
00508   subPop        = popmoo.subPop;
00509   ascending     = popmoo.ascending;
00510   spinOnce      = popmoo.spinOnce;
00511 
00512   return *this;
00513 }
00514 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00515 
00516 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00517 // TO-PM-045
00518 PopulationMOO& PopulationMOO::operator = ( const Population& pop )
00519 {
00520   // check the size
00521   if ( size( ) != pop.size( ) ){
00522     cerr << "Error in TO-PM-044" << endl;
00523     throw("size mismatch");
00524   }
00525   // copy individuals
00526   for ( unsigned i = size( ); i--; ){
00527     (*this)[i] = pop[i];
00528   }
00529   // copy internal variables
00530   index     = pop.getIndex( );
00531   subPop    = pop.getSubPop( );
00532   ascending = pop.ascendingFitness( );
00533   spinOnce  = pop.getSpinOnce( );
00534 
00535   return *this;
00536 }
00537 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00538 
00539 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00540 // TO-PM-046
00541 bool PopulationMOO::operator == ( const PopulationMOO& popmoo ) const
00542 {
00543   if ( size( ) == popmoo.size( ) )
00544   {
00545           for ( unsigned i = size( ); i--; )
00546           {
00547                   if ( (*this)[i] != popmoo[i] )
00548                   {
00549                           return false;
00550                   }
00551           }
00552 
00553           return        index         == popmoo.index        &&
00554                                 subPop        == popmoo.subPop       &&
00555                                 ascending     == popmoo.ascending    &&
00556                                 spinOnce      == popmoo.spinOnce;
00557   }
00558 
00559   return false;
00560 }

00563 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00564 // TO-PM-052
00565 void PopulationMOO::setAscending( bool strategy )
00566 {
00567   if ( strategy ){
00568     Population::setMinimize( );
00569   }
00570   else{
00571     Population::setMaximize( );
00572   }
00573 }

00578 // TO-PM-057
00579 void PopulationMOO::setSpinOnce( bool spin )
00580 {
00581   if ( spin ){
00582     Population::spinWheelOneTime( );
00583   }
00584   else{
00585     Population::spinWheelMultipleTimes( );
00586   }
00587 }

00610 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00611 // TO-PM-072
00612 void PopulationMOO::replace( unsigned i,  const Population& pop )
00613 {
00614   RANGE_CHECK( i + pop.size( ) <= size( ) )
00615   PopulationMOO popmoo( pop );
00616   for ( unsigned j = popmoo.size( ); j--; ){
00617     (*this)[ i + j ] = popmoo[ j ];
00618   }
00619 }

00701 void PopulationMOO::append( const PopulationMOO& popmoo )
00702 {
00703   insert( size( ), popmoo );
00704 }

00708 // TO-PM-082
00709 void PopulationMOO::remove( unsigned i )
00710 {
00711   RANGE_CHECK( i < size( ) )
00712   delete *( begin( ) + i );
00713   vector< Individual * >::erase( begin( ) + i );
00714 }
00715 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00716 
00717 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00718 // TO-PM-083
00719 void PopulationMOO::remove( unsigned i, unsigned k )
00720 {
00721   if ( i < k ){
00722     RANGE_CHECK( k < size( ) )
00723     for ( unsigned j = i; j < k; j++ ){
00724       delete *( begin( ) + j );
00725     }
00726     vector< Individual * >::erase( begin( ) + i, begin( ) + k );
00727   }
00728 }
00729 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------

00731 // static comparison function
00732 bool PopulationMOO::compareFitnessAscending(Individual*const& pInd1, Individual*const& pInd2)
00733 {
00734         return pInd1->getFitness() < pInd2->getFitness();
00735 }
00736 
00737 // static comparison function
00738 bool PopulationMOO::compareFitnessDescending(Individual*const& pInd1, Individual*const& pInd2)
00739 {
00740         return pInd1->getFitness() > pInd2->getFitness();
00741 }

00743 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00744 // TO-PM-093-b
00745 void PopulationMOO::sortIndividuals( std::vector< IndividualMOO* >& indvec )
00746 {
00747         // sort in time ~ n log(n)
00748         if (ascendingFitness())
00749         {
00750                 std::sort(indvec.begin(), indvec.end(), compareFitnessAscending);
00751         }
00752         else
00753         {
00754                 std::sort(indvec.begin(), indvec.end(), compareFitnessDescending);
00755         }
00756 }
00757 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00758 
00759 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00760 // TO-PM-094
00761 void PopulationMOO::sort( )
00762 {
00763         // sort in time ~ n log(n)
00764         if (ascendingFitness())
00765         {
00766                 std::sort(begin(), end(), compareFitnessAscending);
00767         }
00768         else
00769         {
00770                 std::sort(begin(), end(), compareFitnessDescending);
00771         }
00772 }

00785 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00786 // TO-PM-098
00787 
00788 void PopulationMOO::exchange( PopulationMOO& popmoo )
00789 {
00790   // check the size
00791   SIZE_CHECK( size( ) == popmoo.size( ) )
00792   // swap Individuals
00793   for ( unsigned i = size( ); i--; ){
00794     std::swap( (*this)[i], popmoo[i] );
00795   }
00796   // swap internal variables
00797   std::swap( index    , popmoo.index     );
00798   std::swap( subPop   , popmoo.subPop    );
00799   std::swap( ascending, popmoo.ascending );
00800   std::swap( spinOnce , popmoo.spinOnce  );
00801 }

00805 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00806 // TO-PM-102
00807 IndividualMOO& PopulationMOO::oneOfBest( )
00808 {
00809   RANGE_CHECK( size( ) > 0 )
00810   std::vector< unsigned > bestIndices;
00811 
00812   // store best value
00813   double best = ( ascending? minFitness( ): maxFitness( ) );  
00814   // find all indices of best individuals ( unsorted PopulationMOO )
00815   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < size( ); i++ ){
00816     if ( (*this)[i].fitnessValue( ) == best ){
00817       bestIndices.push_back( i );
00818     }
00819   }
00820   // return one of best individuals using random.
00821   return (*this)[bestIndices[ Rng::discrete( 0, bestIndices.size( ) - 1 ) ]];
00822 }
00823 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------

00825 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00826 // TO-PM-103
00827 const IndividualMOO& PopulationMOO::oneOfBest( ) const
00828 {
00829   RANGE_CHECK( size( ) > 0 )
00830   std::vector< unsigned > bestIndices;
00831 
00832   // store best value
00833   double best = ( ascending? minFitness( ): maxFitness( ) );  
00834   // find all indices of best individuals ( unsorted PopulationMOO )
00835   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < size( ); i++ ){
00836     if ( (*this)[i].fitnessValue( ) == best ){
00837       bestIndices.push_back( i );
00838     }
00839   }
00840   // return one of best individuals using random.
00841   return (*this)[bestIndices[ Rng::discrete( 0, bestIndices.size( ) - 1 ) ]];
00842 }

00898       ( !ascending && i1.fitnessValue( ) > i2.fitnessValue( ) ) ){

00900   }

00902     return i2;
00903   }
00904 }

00990 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------

00992 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00993 // TO-PM-210
00994 int PopulationMOO::Dominate( unsigned i1, unsigned i2 )
00995 {
00996   // check the number of objective functions
00997   if ( (*this)[i1].getNoOfObj( ) != (*this)[i2].getNoOfObj( ) ){
00998     cerr << "\n ***** The number of objective functions are different in TO-PM-211 *****\n" << endl;
00999     throw("wrong number of objectives");
01000   }
01001   unsigned NoOfObj = (*this)[i1].getNoOfObj( );
01002   // set flag for calculation
01003   unsigned flag1 = 0;
01004   unsigned flag2 = 0;
01005   unsigned flag3 = 0;
01006   // calculation
01007   for ( unsigned i = NoOfObj; i--; ){
01008     if ( (*this)[i1].getMOOFitness(i) > (*this)[i2].getMOOFitness(i) ){
01009       flag1++;
01010     }
01011     else if ( (*this)[i1].getMOOFitness(i) < (*this)[i2].getMOOFitness(i) ){
01012       flag3++;
01013     }
01014     else{
01015       flag2++;
01016     }
01017   }
01018   if ( !ascending ){
01019     std::swap( flag1, flag3 );
01020   }
01021   // relationship
01022   if ( flag1 + flag2 + flag3 != NoOfObj ){
01023     return 0; // abnormal
01024   }
01025   else if ( flag3 == NoOfObj ){
01026     return 3; // i1 dominates i2 completely
01027   }
01028   else if ( flag3 != 0 && flag1 == 0 ){
01029     return 2; // i1 dominates i2 imcompletely
01030   }
01031   else if ( flag2 == NoOfObj ){
01032     return 1; // i1 equals i2
01033   }
01034   else if ( flag1 == NoOfObj ){
01035     return -3; // i2 dominates i1 completely
01036   }
01037   else if ( flag1 != 0 && flag3 == 0 ){
01038     return -2; // i2 dominates i1 imcompletely
01039   }
01040   else{
01041     return -1; // trade off
01042   }
01043 }
01044 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01045 
01046 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01047 // TO-PM-211
01048 void PopulationMOO::MOGAFonsecaRank( )
01049 {
01050   unsigned i,j,k;
01051   int      l;
01052   // initialize rank
01053   setMOORank( 0 );
01054   // calculation
01055   for ( i = size( ); i--; ){
01056     k = 1;
01057     for ( j = size( ); j--; ){
01058       l = (*this).Dominate( i, j );
01059       if ( l < -1 ){
01060         k++;
01061       }
01062     }
01063     (*this)[i].setMOORank( k );
01064   }
01065 }
01066 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01067 
01068 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01069 // TO-PM-212
01070 void PopulationMOO::MOGAGoldbergRank( )
01071 {
01072   unsigned i,j,k;
01073   int      l;
01074   unsigned CurrentRank = 0;
01075   unsigned *StoreRank;
01076   StoreRank = new unsigned[size()];
01077   unsigned NoAssign = size( );
01078   // initialize rank
01079   setMOORank( 0 );
01080   // calculation
01081   while( NoAssign ){
01082     CurrentRank++;
01083     for ( i = size( ); i--; ){
01084       if ( (*this)[i].getMOORank( ) == 0 ){
01085         k = 1;
01086         for ( j = size( ); j--; ){
01087           l = (*this).Dominate( i, j );
01088           if ( l < -1 && (*this)[j].getMOORank( ) == 0 ){
01089             k++;
01090           }
01091         }
01092       }
01093       else{
01094         k = 0;
01095       }
01096       StoreRank[ i ] = k;
01097     }
01098     for ( unsigned i = size( ); i--; ){
01099       if ( StoreRank[ i ] == 1 ){
01100         (*this)[i].setMOORank( CurrentRank );
01101         NoAssign--;
01102       }
01103     }
01104 
01105   } 
01106   delete [] StoreRank;
01107 }
01108 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01109 
01110 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01111 // TO-PM-213
01112 void PopulationMOO::NSGAIIRank( )
01113 {
01114   unsigned i,j;
01115   int      l;
01116   unsigned CurrentRank = 0;
01117   unsigned NoAssign = size( );
01118   unsigned check;
01119   unsigned **RankData;
01120   RankData = new unsigned* [size()];
01121   for ( i = size( ); i--; )
01122           RankData[i]=new unsigned[size()];
01123   unsigned *Rank;
01124   Rank=new unsigned[size()];
01125   for ( i = size( ); i--; ){
01126     Rank[ i ] = 0;
01127     for ( j = size( ); j--; ){
01128       RankData[ i ][ j ] = 0;
01129     }
01130   }
01131   // initiailize rank
01132   setMOORank( 0 );
01133   // MOGAFonseca flow
01134   for ( i = size( ); i--; ){
01135     Rank[ i ] = 1;
01136     for ( j = size( ); j--; ){
01137       l = (*this).Dominate( i, j );
01138       if ( l < -1 ){
01139         Rank[ i ]++;
01140         RankData[ i ][ j ] = 1;
01141       }
01142     }
01143   }
01144   // assign the rank
01145   while( NoAssign ){
01146     check = NoAssign;
01147     CurrentRank++;
01148     for ( i = size( ); i--; ){
01149       if ( Rank[ i ] == 1 ){
01150         (*this)[i].setMOORank( CurrentRank );
01151         NoAssign--;
01152         for ( j = size( ); j--; ){
01153           RankData[ j ][ i ] = 0;
01154         }
01155       }
01156     }
01157     // correct Rank[ ]
01158     for ( i = size( ); i--; ){
01159       if ( (*this)[i].getMOORank( ) == 0 ){
01160         Rank[ i ] = 1;
01161         for ( j = size( ); j--; ){
01162           Rank[ i ] += RankData[ i ][ j ];
01163         }
01164       }
01165       else{
01166         Rank[ i ] = 0;
01167       }
01168     }
01169     if ( check == NoAssign ){
01170       cout << "\n ***** Calculation Error in TO-PM-213 *****\n" << endl;
01171       NoAssign = 0;
01172     }
01173   }
01174   for ( i = size( ); i--; )
01175         delete [] RankData[i];
01176   delete [] RankData;
01177   delete [] Rank;       
01178 }
01179 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------

01181 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01182 // TO-PM-250
01183 void PopulationMOO::MOORankToFitness( )
01184 {
01185   unsigned i,r,m;
01186   if ( ascendingFitness( ) ){
01187     for ( i = 0; i < size( ); i++ ){
01188       r = (*this)[i].getMOORank( );
01189       (*this)[i].setFitness( static_cast< double >(r) );
01190     }
01191   }
01192   else{
01193     m = 0;
01194     for ( i = 0; i < size( ); i++ ){
01195       r = (*this)[i].getMOORank( );
01196       if ( r > m ){
01197         m = r;
01198       }
01199     }
01200     for ( i = 0; i < size( ); i++ ){
01201       r = (*this)[i].getMOORank( );
01202       r = m - r + 1;
01203       (*this)[i].setFitness( static_cast< double >(r) );
01204     }
01205   }
01206 }

01251 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01252 
01253 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01254 // TO-PM-401 ( OK )
01255 void PopulationMOO::selectElitists( PopulationMOO& offspring, unsigned numElitists )
01256 {
01257   if ( numElitists ){
01258     double   s;
01259     double   dtemp;
01260     unsigned utemp;
01261          unsigned i;
01262     PopulationMOO pop( *this );
01263     std::vector< IndividualMOO* > indvec( pop.size( ) + offspring.size( ) );
01264     // Sort
01265     for ( i = 0; i < pop.size( ); i++ ){
01266       indvec[ i ] = &( pop[ i ] );
01267     }
01268     for ( i = 0; i < offspring.size( ); i++ ){
01269       indvec[ size( ) + i ] = &( offspring[ i ] );
01270     }
01271     sortIndividuals( indvec );
01272     // Copy elitists and correct selection probabilities
01273     for ( i = 0; i < size( ) && i < numElitists; i++ ){
01274       dtemp = indvec[i]->getSelProb( );
01275       indvec[i]->setSelProb( dtemp - min( dtemp, 1.0/size( ) ) );
01276       utemp = indvec[i]->getNumCopies( );
01277       indvec[i]->setNumCopies( utemp + 1 );
01278       indvec[i]->setElitist( true );
01279       ( *this )[ i ] = *indvec[ i ];
01280     }
01281     s = 0;
01282     for ( i = 0; i < offspring.size( ); i++ ){
01283       s += offspring[ i ].getSelProb( );
01284     }
01285     if ( s > 0 ){
01286       for( i = 0; i < offspring.size( ); i++ ){
01287         dtemp = offspring[ i ].getSelProb( );
01288         offspring[ i ].setSelProb( dtemp / s );
01289       }
01290     }
01291   }
01292 }
01293 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01294 
01295 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01296 // TO-PM-402
01297 void PopulationMOO::selectRouletteWheel( PopulationMOO& popmoo, 
01298                                          unsigned numElitists )
01299 {
01300   unsigned i, j;
01301   double p, r, s;
01302   unsigned temp;
01303   if ( getSpinOnce( ) ){
01304     p = size( ) - numElitists;
01305     r = Rng::uni( 0, 1 );
01306     s = 0.0;
01307     for ( i = numElitists, j = 0; i < size( ) && j < popmoo.size( ); j++ ){
01308       s += p * popmoo[ j ].getSelProb( );
01309       while ( s > r && i < size( ) ){
01310         temp = popmoo[ j ].getNumCopies( );
01311         popmoo[ j ].setNumCopies( temp + 1 );
01312         (*this)[ i++ ] = popmoo[ j ];
01313         r++;
01314       }
01315     }
01316   }
01317   else {
01318     for ( i = numElitists; i < size( ); ){
01319       r = Rng::uni( 0, 1 );
01320       s = 0.0;
01321       for ( j = 0; j < popmoo.size( ) && r >= ( p = popmoo[ j ].getSelProb( ) ) + s;
01322             s += p, j++ ){
01323       }
01324       RANGE_CHECK( j < popmoo.size( ) )
01325       temp = popmoo[ j ].getNumCopies( );
01326       popmoo[ j ].setNumCopies( temp + 1 );
01327     }
01328   }
01329 }

01336 {
01337   Population::linearDynamicScaling( window, t );

01340 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01341 
01342 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01343 // TO-PM-410 ( OK )
01344 void PopulationMOO::selectMuLambda( PopulationMOO& offspring, 
01345                                     unsigned numElitists )
01346 {
01347   unsigned i, j;
01348   unsigned utemp;
01349   // Clear number of copies and select elitists
01350   offspring.selectInit( );
01351   selectElitists( offspring, numElitists );
01352   // Sort offspring ( only pointers )
01353   std::vector< IndividualMOO* > indvec( offspring.size( ) );
01354   for ( unsigned k = 0; k < offspring.size( ); k++ ){
01355     indvec[ k ] = &( offspring[ k ] );
01356   }
01357   sortIndividuals( indvec );
01358   // Select
01359   for ( i = numElitists, j = 0; 
01360         i < size( ) && j < indvec.size( ); j++ ){
01361     if ( ! indvec[ j ]->getElitist( ) ){
01362       utemp = indvec[ j ]->getNumCopies( );
01363       indvec[ j ]->setNumCopies( utemp + 1 );
01364       (*this)[ i++ ] = *indvec[ j ];
01365     }
01366   }
01367   // Fill remaining slots with the worst individual
01368   while ( i < size( ) ){
01369     utemp = indvec[ j - 1 ]->getNumCopies( );
01370     indvec[ j - 1 ]->setNumCopies( utemp + 1 );
01371     (*this)[ i++ ] = *indvec[ j - 1 ];
01372   }
01373 }
01374 
01375 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01376 
01377 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01378 // TO-PM-412 ( OK )
01379 void PopulationMOO::selectProportional( PopulationMOO& popmoo, 
01380                     unsigned numElitists )
01381 {
01382     unsigned i;
01383     double   s, t;
01384     double   temp;
01385     // clear number of copies and select elitists
01386     popmoo.selectInit( );
01387     selectElitists( popmoo, numElitists );
01388     // selection probabilities are proportional to the (scaled) fitness
01389     for( t = 0., i = 0; i < popmoo.size( ); i++ ){
01390       if( popmoo[ i ].getScaledFitness( ) < t ){
01391         t = popmoo[ i ].getScaledFitness( );
01392       }
01393     }
01394     for( s = 0., i = 0; i < popmoo.size( ); i++ ){
01395       temp = popmoo[ i ].getScaledFitness( ) - t;
01396       popmoo[ i ].setScaledFitness( temp );
01397       s += popmoo[ i ].getScaledFitness( );
01398     }
01399     for( i = 0; i < popmoo.size( ); i++ ){
01400       temp = popmoo[ i ].getScaledFitness( ) / s;
01401       popmoo[ i ].setSelProb( temp );
01402     }
01403     // select individuals by roulette wheel selection
01404     selectRouletteWheel( popmoo, numElitists );
01405 }
01406 
01407 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01408 
01409 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01410 // TO-PM-413
01411 IndividualMOO&  PopulationMOO::selectOneIndividual( )
01412 {
01413   double t,s,r;
01414   unsigned i;
01415   // calculate minimum scaled fitness value
01416   t = 0.0;
01417   for ( i = 0; i < size( ); i++ ){
01418     if ( (*this)[i].getScaledFitness( ) < t ){
01419       t = (*this)[i].getScaledFitness( );
01420     }
01421   }
01422   // correct scaled fitness value
01423   for ( i = 0; i < size( ); i++ ){
01424     s = (*this)[i].getScaledFitness( ) - t;
01425     (*this)[i].setScaledFitness( s );
01426   }
01427   // calculate sum of scaled fitness value
01428   s = 0.0;
01429   for ( i = 0; i < size( ); i++ ){
01430     s += (*this)[i].getScaledFitness( );
01431   }
01432   // calculate selection probabilities
01433   for ( i = 0; i < size( ); i++ ){
01434     t = (*this)[i].getScaledFitness( ) / s;
01435     (*this)[i].setSelProb( t );
01436   }
01437   // select individual
01438   r = Rng::uni( 0, 1 );
01439   s = 0.0;
01440   for ( i = 0; i< size( ) && r > ( t = (*this)[i].getSelProb( ) ) + s; s +=t, i++ );
01441   i = ((*this)[i].getNumCopies( )) + 1;
01442   (*this)[i].setNumCopies( i );
01443 
01444   return (*this)[i];
01445 }
01446 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01447 
01448 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01449 // TO-PM-450
01450 void PopulationMOO::NormalizeSelectProb( )
01451 {
01452   double total = 0.0;
01453   double sp;
01454   unsigned i;
01455   for ( i = size( ); i--; ){
01456     total += (*this)[i].getSelProb( );
01457   }
01458   if ( total == 0.0 ){
01459     cerr << "\n ***** Total probability is 0 in TO-PM-450 *****\n" << endl;
01460     throw("cannot compute selection probability");
01461   }
01462   for ( i = size( ); i--; ){
01463     sp = (*this)[i].getSelProb( ) / total;
01464     (*this)[i].setSelProb( sp );
01465   }
01466 }
01467 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01468 
01469 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01470 // TO-PM-451
01471 void PopulationMOO::SelectProbMichalewicz( double c )
01472 {
01473   // calculate selection probability
01474   double sp;
01475   for ( unsigned i = size( ); i--; ){
01476     if ( (*this)[i].getMOORank( ) <= 0 ){
01477       cerr << "\n ***** No rank data in TO-PM-451 *****\n" << endl;
01478       throw("cannot compute selection probability");
01479     }
01480     sp = c * pow( ( double ) ( 1.0 - c ), ( double ) ( (*this)[i].getMOORank( ) - 1 ) );
01481     (*this)[i].setSelProb( sp );
01482   }
01483 }

01487 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01488 // TO-PM-500
01489 void PopulationMOO::printPM( )
01490 {
01491   cout << "\n\n********** PopulationMOO **********\n";
01492   cout << "No. of Individuals         : " << (*this).size( ) << "\n";
01493   cout << "Variable ( index )         : " << (*this).index << "\n";
01494   cout << "Variable ( subPop )        : " << (*this).subPop << "\n";
01495   cout << "Variable ( ascending )     : " << (*this).ascending << "\n";
01496   cout << "Variable ( spinOnce )      : " << (*this).spinOnce << "\n";
01497   cout << endl;
01498 }

01501 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01502 // TO-PM-601
01503 double PopulationMOO::PhenoFitDisN2( unsigned i1, unsigned i2 )
01504 {
01505   double distance = 0.0;
01506   for ( unsigned i = (*this)[i1].getNoOfObj( ); i--; ){
01507     distance += pow( (*this)[i1].getMOOFitness( i ) -
01508                      (*this)[i2].getMOOFitness( i ), 2 );
01509   }
01510   distance = sqrt( distance );
01511   return distance;
01512 }
01513 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01514 
01515 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01516 // TO-PM-704
01517 void PopulationMOO::NicheCountPFN2( double sr )
01518 {
01519   double distance;
01520   unsigned count;
01521   for ( unsigned i1 = (*this).size( ); i1--; ){
01522     count = 0;
01523     for ( unsigned i2 = (*this).size( ); i2--; ){
01524       distance = PhenoFitDisN2( i1, i2 );
01525       if ( distance <= sr ){
01526         count++;
01527       }
01528     }
01529     (*this)[i1].setMOOShare( static_cast< double >( count ) );
01530   }
01531 }

01534 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01535 // TO-PM-790
01536 void PopulationMOO::SharingSelProb( )
01537 {
01538   double share;
01539   double selprob;
01540   for ( unsigned i = size( ); i--; ){
01541     share = (*this)[i].getMOOShare( );
01542     if ( share == 0.0 ){
01543       cout << "\n ***** Sharing value is 0 in TO-PM-790 *****\n" << endl;
01544       return;
01545     }
01546     selprob = (*this)[i].getSelProb( ) / share;
01547     (*this)[i].setSelProb( selprob );
01548   }
01549 }
01550 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01551 
01552 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01553 // TO-PM-800
01554 void PopulationMOO::SelectByRoulette( PopulationMOO& offsprings, unsigned elit )
01555 {
01556   double *pileProb;
01557   pileProb = new double[size( )];
01558   double r;
01559   unsigned nc;
01560   unsigned i;
01561   offsprings.NormalizeSelectProb( );
01562   if ( !elit ){
01563     selectInit( );
01564   }
01565   // calculate the piled-up probability
01566   for ( i = 0; i < size( ); i++ ){
01567     if ( i == 0 ){
01568       pileProb[ i ] = offsprings[i].getSelProb( );
01569     }
01570     else{
01571       pileProb[ i ] = offsprings[i].getSelProb( ) + pileProb[ i - 1 ];
01572     }
01573   }
01574   // selection
01575   for ( i = elit; i < size( ); i++ ){
01576     r = Rng::uni( 0.0, 1.0 );
01577     if ( r <= pileProb[ 0 ] ){
01578         nc = offsprings[0].getNumCopies( );
01579         offsprings[0].setNumCopies( nc++ );
01580         (*this)[i] = offsprings[0];
01581     }
01582     else {
01583       for ( unsigned j = 1; j < size( ); j++ ){
01584         if ( r <= pileProb[ j ] && r > pileProb[ j-1 ] ){
01585           nc = offsprings[j].getNumCopies( );
01586           offsprings[j].setNumCopies( nc++ );
01587           (*this)[i] = offsprings[j];
01588         }
01589       }
01590     }
01591   }
01592   delete [] pileProb;
01593 }
01594 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01595 
01596 
01597 // static comparison function
01598 bool PopulationMOO::compareRankShare(Individual*const& pInd1, Individual*const& pInd2)
01599 {
01600         IndividualMOO* pI1 = (IndividualMOO*)pInd1;
01601         IndividualMOO* pI2 = (IndividualMOO*)pInd2;
01602 
01603         unsigned Rank1 = pI1->getMOORank();
01604         unsigned Rank2 = pI2->getMOORank();
01605         double Share1 = pI1->getMOOShare();
01606         double Share2 = pI2->getMOOShare();
01607 
01608         return ((Rank1 < Rank2) || (Rank1 == Rank2 && Share1 > Share2));
01609 }

01612 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01613 // TO-PM-2000
01614 void PopulationMOO::crowdedTournamentSelection( PopulationMOO& offsprings )
01615 {
01616   // Combined Population
01617   PopulationMOO total( size( ) + offsprings.size( ) );
01618   total.combinePopulationMOO( (*this), offsprings );
01619   // Calculate Crowded Distance. In this function, the rank also is calculated.
01620   total.crowdedDistance( );
01621 
01622   // sort in time ~ n log(n)
01623   std::sort(total.begin(), total.end(), compareRankShare);
01624 
01625   // Selection
01626   unsigned int j;
01627   for ( j = 0; j < size( ); j++ ){
01628     (*this)[ j ] = total[ j ];
01629   } 
01630 }
01631 
01632 
01633 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01634 // TO-PM-2001
01635 void PopulationMOO::crowdedDistance( bool UnpenalizedFitness )
01636 {
01637   unsigned counter;
01638   double max = 0.0;
01639   double min = 0.0;
01640   std::vector< unsigned > sort( size( ) );
01641   std::vector< unsigned > global( size( ) );
01642   //std::vector< unsigned > minisort( size( ) );
01643   double temp1;
01644   double temp2;
01645   unsigned i;
01646 
01647   // Rank calculation
01648   NSGAIIRank( );
01649   // Maximum Rank
01650   const unsigned maxrank = maxMOORank( );
01651   // Initialize sharing values
01652   setMOOShare( 0.0 );
01653 
01654   // Rank Loop
01655   for ( unsigned rank = 1; rank <= maxrank; rank++ )
01656     {
01657       // gather individuals with the same rank into a sub population
01658       // PopulationMOO subpop( numberOfMOORank( rank ) );
01659       counter = 0;
01660       for ( i = 0; i < size( ); i++ )
01661         {
01662           if ( (*this)[ i ].getMOORank( ) == rank )
01663             {
01664               global[ counter ] = i;
01665               counter++;
01666             }
01667         }
01668       // Object Loop 
01669       for ( unsigned obj = 0; obj < 2; obj++ ){
01670         // Max and min
01671         if(UnpenalizedFitness)
01672           {
01673             max = (*this)[ 0 ].getUnpenalizedMOOFitness( obj );
01674             min = (*this)[ 0 ].getUnpenalizedMOOFitness( obj );
01675           }
01676         else 
01677           {
01678             max = (*this)[ 0 ].getMOOFitness( obj );
01679             min = (*this)[ 0 ].getMOOFitness( obj );
01680           }
01681         for ( i = 1; i < size( ); i++ )
01682           {
01683             if(UnpenalizedFitness)
01684               {
01685                 if ( max < (*this)[ i ].getUnpenalizedMOOFitness( obj ) )
01686                   max = (*this)[ i ].getUnpenalizedMOOFitness( obj );
01687                 if ( min > (*this)[ i ].getUnpenalizedMOOFitness( obj ) )
01688                   min = (*this)[ i ].getUnpenalizedMOOFitness( obj );
01689               }
01690             else
01691               {
01692                 if ( max < (*this)[ i ].getMOOFitness( obj ) )
01693                   max = (*this)[ i ].getMOOFitness( obj );
01694                 if ( min > (*this)[ i ].getMOOFitness( obj ) )
01695                   min = (*this)[ i ].getMOOFitness( obj );
01696               }
01697           }
01698         // Initialization of index vector
01699         for ( i = 0; i < size( ); i++ )
01700           sort[ i ] = i;
01701 
01702         // sort in time ~ n log(n)
01703         SortMOO_CD sorter(&sort, &global, counter, this, obj, UnpenalizedFitness);
01704         sorter.sort();
01705 
01706         // Calculate Crowding Distance
01707 #ifdef _WIN32
01708         (*this)[ global[ sort[ 0 ] ] ].setMOOShare( numeric_limits< double >::max( ) );
01709         (*this)[ global[ sort[ counter - 1 ] ] ].setMOOShare( numeric_limits< double >::max( ) );
01710 #else
01711         (*this)[ global[ sort[ 0 ] ] ].setMOOShare( MAXDOUBLE );
01712         (*this)[ global[ sort[ counter - 1 ] ] ].setMOOShare( MAXDOUBLE );
01713 #endif
01714 
01715         for ( i = 1; i < counter - 1; i++ ){
01716           temp1 = (*this)[ global[ sort[ i ] ] ].getMOOShare( );
01717          #ifdef _WIN32
01718           if ( temp1 != numeric_limits< double >::max( )  ) 
01719          #else
01720             if ( temp1 != MAXDOUBLE )
01721          #endif
01722               {
01723                 if(UnpenalizedFitness)
01724                   temp2 = ( (*this)[ global[ sort[ i + 1 ] ] ].getUnpenalizedMOOFitness( obj ) 
01725                             - (*this)[ global[ sort[ i - 1 ] ] ].getUnpenalizedMOOFitness( obj ) );
01726                 else 
01727                   temp2 = ( (*this)[ global[ sort[ i + 1 ] ] ].getMOOFitness( obj ) 
01728                             - (*this)[ global[ sort[ i - 1 ] ] ].getMOOFitness( obj ) );
01729                 if(max-min!=0) temp2 /= ( max - min );
01730                 (*this)[ global[ sort[ i ] ] ].setMOOShare( temp1 + temp2 );
01731               }
01732         }
01733       } // Object loop
01734     } // Rank Loop
01735 }
01736 
01737 void PopulationMOO::SMeasure( bool UnpenalizedFitness )
01738 {
01739   unsigned counter;
01740   std::vector< unsigned > sort( size( ) );
01741   std::vector< unsigned > global( size( ) );
01742   std::vector< bool >     assigned( size( ) );
01743   double temp1;
01744   double temp2;
01745   double v;
01746   unsigned i, left, right;
01747 
01748   // Rank calculation
01749   NSGAIIRank( );
01750   // Maximum Rank
01751   const unsigned maxrank = maxMOORank( );
01752   // Initialize sharing values
01753   setMOOShare( 0.0 );
01754 
01755   if((*this)[0].getNoOfObj( )!=2) {
01756     cerr << "SMeasure only defined for two objectives" << endl;
01757     throw("wrong number of objectives");
01758   }
01759 
01760   // rank loop
01761   for ( unsigned rank = 1; rank <= maxrank; rank++ ) {
01762     // gather individuals with the same rank into a sub population
01763     // PopulationMOO subpop( numberOfMOORank( rank ) );
01764     counter = 0;
01765     for ( i = 0; i < size( ); i++ ) {
01766       if ( (*this)[ i ].getMOORank( ) == rank ) {
01767         global[ counter ] = i;
01768         counter++;
01769       }
01770     }
01771 
01772     // sort according to 1st objective
01773     unsigned obj = 0;
01774     // initialization of index vector
01775     for ( i = 0; i < size( ); i++ ) { sort[ i ] = i; assigned[ i ] = false; } 
01776     // sort
01777     bool changed;
01778     do {
01779       changed  = false;
01780       
01781       for ( i = 0; i < counter - 1; i++ ) {
01782         if(UnpenalizedFitness) {
01783           temp1 = (*this)[ global[ sort[ i ] ] ]    .getUnpenalizedMOOFitness( obj );
01784           temp2 = (*this)[ global[ sort[ i + 1 ] ] ].getUnpenalizedMOOFitness( obj );
01785         } else {  
01786           temp1 = (*this)[ global[ sort[ i ] ] ]    .getMOOFitness( obj );
01787           temp2 = (*this)[ global[ sort[ i + 1 ] ] ].getMOOFitness( obj );
01788         }
01789         
01790         if ( temp1 > temp2 ) {
01791           unsigned temp = sort[ i ];
01792           sort[ i ] = sort[ i + 1 ];
01793           sort[ i + 1 ] = temp;
01794           changed  = true ;
01795         }
01796       }
01797     } while (changed);
01798     
01799 #ifdef _WIN32
01800     (*this)[ global[ sort[ 0 ] ] ].setMOOShare( numeric_limits< double >::max( ) );
01801     (*this)[ global[ sort[ counter - 1 ] ] ].setMOOShare( numeric_limits< double >::max( ) );
01802 #else
01803     (*this)[ global[ sort[ 0 ] ] ].setMOOShare( MAXDOUBLE );
01804     (*this)[ global[ sort[ counter - 1 ] ] ].setMOOShare( MAXDOUBLE );
01805 #endif
01806     
01807     for(unsigned e = 1; e < counter - 1; e++) { // loop over all non-border elements
01808       for(i = 1; (assigned[ sort[ i ] ]); i++); // determine 1st not assigned, non-border element
01809       for (left = 0; i < counter - 1;  ) { // loop over all not assigned elements
01810         // determine right not assigned neighbor
01811         for(right = i + 1; (assigned[ sort[ right ] ]); right++); 
01812         
01813         if(UnpenalizedFitness) {
01814           v = ((*this)[ global[ sort[ right ] ] ].getUnpenalizedMOOFitness( 0 ) -
01815                (*this)[ global[ sort[ i  ] ] ].getUnpenalizedMOOFitness( 0 )) * 
01816             ((*this)[ global[ sort[ left ] ] ].getUnpenalizedMOOFitness( 1 ) -
01817              (*this)[ global[ sort[ i  ] ] ].getUnpenalizedMOOFitness( 1 ));
01818         } else {
01819           v = ((*this)[ global[ sort[ right ] ] ].getMOOFitness( 0 ) -
01820                (*this)[ global[ sort[ i  ] ] ].getMOOFitness( 0 )) * 
01821             ((*this)[ global[ sort[ left ] ] ].getMOOFitness( 1 ) -
01822              (*this)[ global[ sort[ i  ] ] ].getMOOFitness( 1 ));
01823         }
01824         (*this)[ global[ sort[ i ] ] ].setMOOShare( v );
01825 
01826         left = i;
01827         i = right;
01828       }
01829       unsigned minIndex = 0;
01830       double min = (*this)[ global[ sort[ minIndex ] ] ].getMOOShare();
01831       for(unsigned f = 1; f < counter - 1; f++) {
01832         if(!assigned[ sort[ f ] ])
01833           if((*this)[ global[ sort[ f ] ] ].getMOOShare() < min) {
01834             min =  (*this)[ global[ sort[ f ] ] ].getMOOShare();
01835             minIndex = f;
01836           }
01837       }
01838       assigned[ sort[ minIndex ] ] = true;
01839     }
01840   } // Rank Loop
01841 }
01842 
01843 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01844 // TO-PM-2002
01845 unsigned PopulationMOO::maxMOORank( )
01846 {
01847   unsigned rank = 0;
01848   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < size( ); i++ ){
01849     if ( (*this)[i].getMOORank( ) > rank ){
01850       rank = (*this)[i].getMOORank( );
01851     }
01852   }
01853   return rank;
01854 }
01855 
01856 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01857 // TO-PM-2003
01858 unsigned PopulationMOO::numberOfMOORank( unsigned rank )
01859 {
01860   unsigned counter = 0;
01861   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < size( ); i++ ){
01862     if ( (*this)[i].getMOORank( ) == rank ){
01863       counter++;
01864     }
01865   }
01866   return counter;
01867 }
01868 
01869 
01870 // static comparison function
01871 bool PopulationMOO::compareScaledFitnessRankShare(Individual*const& pInd1, Individual*const& pInd2)
01872 {
01873         IndividualMOO* pI1 = (IndividualMOO*)pInd1;
01874         IndividualMOO* pI2 = (IndividualMOO*)pInd2;
01875 
01876         return (pI2->getScaledFitness() > pI1->getScaledFitness())
01877                 || (pI2->getScaledFitness() == pI1->getScaledFitness()
01878                         && pI2->getMOORank() < pI1->getMOORank())
01879                 || (pI2->getScaledFitness() == pI1->getScaledFitness()
01880                         && pI2->getMOORank() == pI1->getMOORank()
01881                         && pI2->getMOOShare() > pI1->getMOOShare());
01882 }

01884 
01885 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01886 // SW-PM-2020
01887 void PopulationMOO::selectCrowdedEPTournament( PopulationMOO& offsprings,unsigned q)
01888 {
01889   unsigned i,j;
01890 
01891   Array<unsigned> nichedRanks;
01892   (*this).nichedComparisonRank(offsprings,nichedRanks);
01893 
01894   // Combined Population
01895   PopulationMOO total( size( ) + offsprings.size( ) );
01896   total.combinePopulationMOO( (*this), offsprings );
01897   uint opponent ;
01898 
01899   // perform tournament
01900   for( i = 0; i < total.size(); i++ ) {
01901     total[ i ].scaledFitness = 0;
01902     for( j = 0; j < q; j++ ) {
01903       opponent = Rng::discrete( 0,  total.size() - 1 );
01904       if( nichedRanks(i) <= nichedRanks(opponent)) 
01905         total[ i ].scaledFitness++;
01906     }
01907   }
01908 
01909   // sort in time ~ n log(n)
01910   std::sort(total.begin(), total.end(), compareScaledFitnessRankShare);
01911 
01912   // Selection
01913   for ( i = 0; i < size( ); i++ ){
01914     (*this)[ i ] = total[ i ];
01915   } 
01916 }
01917 
01918 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01919 // SW-PM-2021
01920  void PopulationMOO::nichedComparisonRank(PopulationMOO& offsprings, Array<unsigned>& nichedRanks)
01921 {
01922   // Combined Population
01923   PopulationMOO total( size( ) + offsprings.size( ) );
01924   total.combinePopulationMOO( (*this), offsprings );
01925   unsigned i;
01926 
01927   nichedRanks.resize( total.size( ) );
01928 
01929   vector<unsigned> totinds(total.size());
01930 
01931   for( i = 0; i < total.size(); i++ )
01932     { 
01933       totinds[i]=i;
01934     }
01935 
01936   // Calculate Crowded Distance. In this function, the rank also is calculated.
01937   total.crowdedDistance( );
01938 
01939   // sort in time ~ n log(n)
01940   SortMOO_NCR sorter(&totinds, &total);
01941   sorter.sort();
01942 
01943   for( i = 0; i < total.size(); i++ ) nichedRanks(totinds[i])=i;
01944 }
01945 
01946 
01947 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01948 // TO-PM-2501 ( check ok )
01949 PopulationMOO& PopulationMOO::combinePopulationMOO( PopulationMOO& p1, PopulationMOO& p2 )
01950 {
01951   if ( p1.checkData( p2 ) != 0 ){
01952     cerr << "difference between parent and offspring" << endl;
01953     throw("cannot combine populations");
01954   }
01955 
01956   setAscending( p1.ascendingFitness( ) );
01957   setNoOfObj( p1[0].getNoOfObj( ) );
01958 
01959   unsigned no = p1.size( ) + p2.size( );
01960   for ( unsigned i = no; i--; ){
01961     delete *( begin( ) + i );
01962     if ( i < p1.size( ) ){
01963       *( begin( ) + i ) = new IndividualMOO( p1[ i ] );
01964     }
01965     else {
01966       *( begin( ) + i ) = new IndividualMOO( p2[ i - p1.size( ) ] );
01967     }
01968   }
01969 
01970   return (*this);
01971 }
01972 
01973 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01974 // TO-PM-2502 ( check ok )
01975 PopulationMOO& PopulationMOO::combinePopulationMOO( PopulationMOO& p1, ArchiveMOO& a1 )
01976 {
01977   setAscending( p1.ascendingFitness( ) );
01978   setNoOfObj( p1[0].getNoOfObj( ) );
01979 
01980   unsigned no = p1.size( ) + a1.size( );
01981   for ( unsigned i = no; i--; ){
01982     delete *( begin( ) + i );
01983     if ( i < p1.size( ) ){
01984       *( begin( ) + i ) = new IndividualMOO( p1[ i ] );
01985     }
01986     else {
01987       *( begin( ) + i ) = new IndividualMOO( a1.readArchive( i - p1.size( ) ) );
01988     }
01989   }
01990 
01991   return (*this);
01992 }
01993 
01994 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
01995 // TO-PM-3001
01996 int PopulationMOO::checkData( PopulationMOO& offsprings )
01997 {
01998   if ( ascendingFitness( ) != offsprings.ascendingFitness( ) ) return -1;
01999   if ( (*this)[0].getNoOfObj( ) != offsprings[0].getNoOfObj( ) ) return -1;
02000   return 0;
02001 }
02002 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
02003 //  added by Stefan Wiegand at 28.1.2004
02004 
02005 // SW-PM-4000( pvm pack routine )
02006 int PopulationMOO::pvm_pkpop(){
02007   unsigned i;
02008 
02009   unsigned *s = new unsigned;
02010   *s = this->size();
02011   pvm_pkuint(s,1,1);
02012   delete s; 
02013 
02014   for (i = 0; i < this->size(); i++){
02015     ((*this)[i]).IndividualMOO::pvm_pkind();
02016   }
02017 
02018   uint *u = new uint[4];
02019   u[0] = index;
02020   u[1] = subPop;
02021   u[2] = ascending;
02022   u[3] = spinOnce;
02023   pvm_pkuint(u,4,1);
02024   delete[] u; 
02025 
02026   return 1;
02027 };
02028 
02029 // SW-PM-4001( pvm unpack routine )
02030 int PopulationMOO::pvm_upkpop(){
02031   unsigned i;
02032 
02033   unsigned *s = new unsigned;
02034   pvm_upkuint(s,1,1);
02035   if(this->size()!=*s){
02036     cerr << "PopulationMOO.cpp: the population which has called pvm_upkpop() is of unexpected size!" << endl;
02037     throw("wrong population size");
02038   }
02039   delete s; 
02040 
02041   for (i = 0; i < this->size(); i++) ((*this)[i]).IndividualMOO::pvm_upkind();
02042 
02043   uint *u   = new uint[4];
02044   pvm_upkuint(u,4,1);
02045   index     = u[0] ;
02046   subPop    = u[1]?1:0 ;
02047   ascending = u[2]?1:0 ;
02048   spinOnce  = u[3]?1:0 ;
02049   delete[] u; 
02050 
02051   return 1;
02052 };
02053 
02054 void PopulationMOO::selectCrowdedMuPlusLambda(PopulationMOO& offsprings, bool unpenalized )
02055 {
02056   unsigned i;
02057  
02058   // Combined Population
02059   PopulationMOO total( size( ) + offsprings.size( ) );
02060   total.combinePopulationMOO( (*this), offsprings );
02061 
02062   // Calculate Crowded Distance. In this function, the rank also is calculated.
02063   total.crowdedDistance( unpenalized );
02064 
02065   // Sort
02066   std::sort(total.begin(), total.end(), compareRankShare);
02067 
02068   // Selection
02069   for ( i = 0; i < size( ); i++ ){
02070     (*this)[ i ] = total[ i ];
02071   } 
02072 }

02075 void PopulationMOO::selectCrowdedMuCommaLambda(PopulationMOO& offsprings, bool unpenalized)
02076 {
02077   unsigned i;
02078 
02079   // Calculate Crowded Distance. In this function, the rank also is calculated.
02080   offsprings.crowdedDistance( unpenalized );
02081 
02082   // Sort
02083   std::sort(offsprings.begin(), offsprings.end(), compareRankShare);
02084 
02085   // Selection
02086   for ( i = 0; i < size( ); i++ ){
02087     (*this)[ i ] = offsprings[ i ];
02088   } 
02089 }
02090 
02091 void PopulationMOO::selectBinaryTournamentMOO(PopulationMOO& parents) {
02092   unsigned i;
02093   unsigned np =  parents.size();
02094   unsigned no =  size();
02095   unsigned a, b;
02096   for(i = 0; i < no; i++ ) {
02097     a = Rng::discrete(0, np - 1);
02098     b = Rng::discrete(0, np - 1);
02099     if(compareRankShare(&parents[a], &parents[b])) 
02100       (*this)[i] = parents[a];
02101     else
02102       (*this)[i] = parents[b];
02103   }
02104 }
